channel.title: Pk Rewards
channel.description:
I am using a zenith source and I was wondering, how do I give rewards to player per kill. Lets say someone kills another player, i want to make it so that the player gets 50 guthix tokens. Does anyone know how to do that?
Message me on skype or here - thanks skype: tim3626719

item.title: Pk Rewards
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

I’m pretty sure there’s a method for when you kill a player, or when the player dies, that’s where you’d do your code.

Read full topic
